story-moment.SPARED BY HELA: Upon Hela’s arrival in Asgard, Skurge’s life was spared as he went to work for Hela, the Goddess of Death.
story-moment.HELA'S EXECUTIONER: Hela officially declared Skurge to be her Executioner, giving him an axe as his new weapon.
story-moment.FOR ASGARD!: Abandoning Hela, Skurge attempted to flee, hidden amongst his fellow Asgardians, but ultimately was moved to fight for his people instead.

powers+abilities.EXECUTIONER'S AXE: Skurge was given a mighty axe to wield by Hela, as her Executioner, though he was hesitant to use it against his people.
powers+abilities.BIFROST SWORD: During his tenure as guardian of the Bifrost, Skurge used the sword Hofund to open the gate from Asgard to the rest of the Nine Realms.
powers+abilities.DES & TROY: Perhaps Skurge’s favorite weapons were the two Midgardian M16A1’s taken from Texas that he dubbed Des and Troy.
